content_block_programmatic.name: Project Status Overview
content_block_programmatic.programmatic_content:
// GlideRecord létrehozása és lekérdezés var gr = new GlideRecordSecure('pm_project'); gr.addQuery('sys_id', '23d8ff0847e8021075dbcbb9316d4314'); // Projekt sys_id feltétele gr.query(); // Adatok feltöltése a változókba var data = {}; if (gr.next()) { data.projectName = gr.getValue('short_description'); data.projectManager = gr.getDisplayValue('project_manager'); data.portfolio = gr.getDisplayValue('primary_portfolio'); data.approvedStartDate = gr.getDisplayValue('approved_start_date').substring(0, 10); // Az első 10 karakter (év-hónap-nap) data.approvedEndDate = gr.getDisplayValue('approved_end_date').substring(0, 10); data.plannedStartDate = gr.getDisplayValue('start_date').substring(0, 10); data.plannedEndDate = gr.getDisplayValue('end_date').substring(0, 10); data.state = gr.getDisplayValue('state'); data.phase = gr.getDisplayValue('phase'); data.percentComplete = gr.getValue('percent_complete'); data.actualCost = gr.getDisplayValue('work_cost'); data.actualStartDate = gr.getDisplayValue('work_start').substring(0, 10); data.actualEndDate = gr.getDisplayValue('work_end').substring(0, 10); data.plannedCost = gr.getDisplayValue('cost'); data.description = gr.getDisplayValue('description'); }
